about_the_game:
Who leads the cheerleaders? YOU do! Build your squad, show your spirit, and be the cheerleader New York needs! Cheer for fame, fun, and liberty! Eccentric gangs rule the streets; battle them with your cheer skills, and lead the city out of the darkness.

"Cheerleader's Choice: New York Spirit" is an interactive novel by Charli Battersby. It's entirely text-based, without graphics or sound effects. Your cheerleading career will be powered by your spirit and imagination. You'll cheer and you'll lead! In a game you read.

  • Based on the author's experience as a real cheerleader.
  • Survive in the futuristic dystopia of present-day New York.
  • Start as a newbie, and climb to team captain. Or storm off the team and form a renegade pompom squad.
  • Choose your position in your stunt pod, and master cheer stunts.
  • Challenge quirky gangs to dance-offs, but don't get served by the Fancy Lads, or Bad Mittens!
  • Use cheerleading skills to solve mysteries and engage in espionage missions.
  • Devote yourself to altruism, or live the glamorous life as a famous "Cheer-lebrity."
  • Will you transform into the cheerleader New York deserves? Or are you the pompom vigilante New York needs?
  • Design your team's uniform! Be classic, sexy, sporty, or utterly bizarre.
  • Discover the secret identity of the masked crime-fighter known as "The Spirit Stick."
  • Explore real locations in New York, and cheer everywhere from Central Park, to Coney Island. Can you win the hotdog eating contest?
  • Play as male or female. Fresh out of college, or "Of a certain age."
  • Will you be a seasoned New Yorker, or a tourist who can't pronounce Houston Street?
  • Defy cheerleader stereotypes. Or, like, embrace them and whatever?
  • We got yer pompoms right HERE, pal!
